name: Alexa
description: Publish a skill, get a hoodie (varies by country) and an Echo Spot (if 1,000 unique customers use your skill in its first 30 days of publication)!

name: Aras
description: Submit an improvement to any Aras Community Project in October 2018 to earn stickers! Submit five, earn a limited edition T-shirt!

name: Auth0
description: Have one accepted pull request in a qualifying Auth0 Github project in October 2018 and receive a kickass 2018 Hacktoberfest t-shirt courtesy of the awesome Auth0 team, along with a psychedelic Auth0 sticker pack!

name: Codeship
description: Submit 5 builds in 30 days, get t-shirts & stickers sent your way!

name: devRant
description: Get 30 ++'s on a single rant you've posted to devRant to receive 3 free high-quality devRant laptop stickers! Or post an awesome rant that gets over 750 ++'s to receive a free devRant squishy stress ball!

name: Digital Ocean
description: Make five pull requests in October, earn a limited edition T-shirt!

name: Gatsby
description: Get a pull request merged into Gatsby and receive a free shirt, socks, or stickers.

name: Google Assistant
description: Make an app for the Google Assistant available to users, get an exclusive Google Assistant t-shirt and a Google Home (if a certain number of users engage with it)!

name: Hasura
description: Submit a PR to Hasura's GraphQL Engine repo in October 2018 and get a Hasura sticker pack. If your PR to an issue tagged as 'hacktoberfest' gets merged, you also get a Hasura t-shirt!

name: Kong
description: Everyone who gets 1 PR accepted to a Kong repo can get a Kong Contributor T-shirt!

name: LBRY
description: A sweet T-shirt for anyone who submits 3 Pull Requests. A Lamborghini Aventador S for anyone who submits 800,000 accepted PRs.

name: Magento
description: Have 5 merged PRs or validate at least 10 issues in October 2018, get a Squashtoberfest T-Shirt!

name: Microsoft
description: Make one pull request in October 2018 to any open source Microsoft repository, earn a limited edition T-shirt!

name: Mullvad
description: Send an email to support@mullvad.net with "STICKERS" in the subject line. Include a postal address in the email and get an assortment of stickers sent your way.

name: Netlify
description: Complete this survey about using netlify for documentation and get stickers.

name: Nexmo
description: Have one accepted pull request in October 2018 to any Nexmo Repository, earn a limited edition #nextoberfest T-shirt!

name: npm
description: Fix a bug, get a fashionable pair of socks!

name: OpenBazaar
description: Help improve our code and earn a limited edition shirt.

name: OpenEBS
description: Have one accepted pull request in an OpenEBS repository during October 2018 to earn an OpenEBS t-shirt and stickers. The best PR will also receive a laptop.

name: Operation Code
description: Close 3 issues, get a t-shirt. Make a PR and get stickers.

name: Passenger
description: Register to join the November 1st livestream in which Phusion adds a major feature to Passenger, and win a custom key cap or beanie with the Passenger logo embroided (and stickers, guaranteed).

name: SendGrid
description: Five accepted pull results from SendGrid will qualify you for a special edition SendGrid Hacktoberfest T-shirt.

name: source{d}
description: Three merged pull requests in any source{d} repo to receive a limited edition T-shirt as well as one sticker for those who get at least one pull requests merged.

name: Twilio
description: Complete the first set of objectives in Twilio Quest and get a Twilio Quest t-shirt right to your door.

name: Umbraco
description: Have one accepted pull request in a Umbraco repository during October 2018 to get some super exclusive Umbraco swag. All the contributors will also be listed by Github username in a dedicated blog post in November.

name: WhatIsMyBrowser
description: Send an API request, get some sweet vinyl laptop stickers!
